      • getDisableNotification

        @Nullable
public java.lang.Boolean getDisableNotification()
        Returns:
        Whether the message should be send silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.

      • setDisableNotification

        public void setDisableNotification​(@Nullable
                                   java.lang.Boolean disableNotification)
        Parameters:

      • getReplyMarkup

        @Nullable
public java.lang.String getReplyMarkup()
        Returns:
